statements: SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, shift_time FROM employee_schedules ORDER BY shift_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT shift_type FROM employee_schedules;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE shift_type = 'Morning';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM employee_schedules GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_shifts > 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY shift_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(shift_time) AS latest_shift FROM employee_schedules GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM employee_schedules WHERE shift_type = 'Morning' GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT employee_id, shift_type, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM employee_schedules GROUP BY employee_id, shift_type ORDER BY employee_id ASC, total_shifts DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM employee_schedules WHERE shift_time BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE shift_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, department, shift_id FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE shift_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department, shift_name FROM employees INNER JOIN shifts ON employees.shift_id = shifts.shift_id;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, shift_id FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (101, 105, 110);
SELECT employee_name, department, start_time, end_time FROM employees INNER JOIN shifts ON employees.shift_id = shifts.shift_id ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, position, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM shifts ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT shift_id, start_time, location FROM shifts WHERE location = 'Office';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering'
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager'
SELECT name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE location = 'Headquarters' ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT e.name, s.location FROM employees e INNER JOIN shifts s ON e.employee_id = s.shift_id
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, name, role FROM employees ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, manager_id FROM warehouse WHERE location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT name, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY manager_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date, shift_id;

SELECT e.name, s.shift_name, w.location FROM employees e JOIN schedules sc ON e.employee_id = sc.employee_id JOIN shifts s ON sc.shift_id = s.shift_id JOIN warehouse w ON w.manager_id = e.employee_id;

SELECT e.name, s.shift_name FROM employees e LEFT JOIN schedules sc ON e.employee_id = sc.employee_id LEFT JOIN shifts s ON sc.shift_id = s.shift_id WHERE e.role = 'Associate' ORDER BY e.name ASC, s.shift_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_role DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_phone FROM employees WHERE employee_shift_id = 3;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, warehouse_name FROM employees JOIN warehouses ON employee_id = warehouse_id;
SELECT schedule_date, shift_name, employee_name FROM schedules JOIN shifts ON schedules.shift_id = shifts.shift_id JOIN employees ON schedules.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_shift_id IS NOT NULL;
